医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
营养素缺乏模式可能是老年高血压患者死亡的重要危险因素研究人员确定了营养缺乏对患有高血压的老年人死亡风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Nutrients-deficiency-pattern-possible-important-risk-factor-for-mortality-in-older-adults-with-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Nutrients-deficiency-pattern-possible-important-risk-factor-for-mortality-in-older-adults-with-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c051ddec-fa21-47cd-b99e-20e452c15c7a Wed, 12 Jun 2024 12:07:00 -0400 Nutrients deficiency pattern possible important risk factor for mortality in older adults with hypertension

毒蝇伞蘑菇不受监管的销售需要公共卫生对策毒蝇伞的法律地位、安全性和可用性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/The-unregulated-sale-of-Amanita-muscaria-mushrooms-needs-a-public-health-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/The-unregulated-sale-of-Amanita-muscaria-mushrooms-needs-a-public-health-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=473d83fb-0d1d-4ffc-bc12-8428c62b6068 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 06:53:00 -0400 The unregulated sale of Amanita muscaria mushrooms needs a public health response
Enterprise Therapeutics 发布了 ETD001 的临床前概况，这是一种新型吸入式 ENaC 阻滞剂Enterprise Therapeutics Ltd（Enterprise）是一家致力于发现和开发新疗法以改善呼吸系统疾病患者生活的生物制药公司，今天宣布在《囊性纤维化杂志》上发表一项同行评审研究1。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Enterprise-Therapeutics-publishes-preclinical-profile-of-ETD001-a-novel-inhaled-ENaC-blocker.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Enterprise-Therapeutics-publishes-preclinical-profile-of-ETD001-a-novel-inhaled-ENaC-blocker.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ee5629c-e11c-4083-9be1-fd735ada3e4e Wed, 12 Jun 2024 06:52:00 -0400 Enterprise Therapeutics publishes preclinical profile of ETD001, a novel inhaled ENaC blocker
研究发现糖税可能会使儿童哮喘住院率降低 20.9%英国 (UK) 软饮料行业税 (SDIL) 对儿童哮喘住院率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Research-finds-sugar-tax-may-lower-childhood-asthma-hospital-admission-rates-by-20925.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Research-finds-sugar-tax-may-lower-childhood-asthma-hospital-admission-rates-by-20925.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=792b93b2-e962-446f-ba66-9e72699fd179 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 06:08:00 -0400 Research finds sugar tax may lower childhood asthma hospital admission rates by 20.9%
天然抗氧化剂可以延缓与年龄相关的男性睾酮生成下降天然多酚化合物可增强睾丸激素的产生并预防老年男性与年龄相关的性腺功能减退症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Natural-antioxidants-could-delay-age-lated-decline-in-male-testosterone-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Natural-antioxidants-could-delay-age-lated-decline-in-male-testosterone-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2072ece4-cc81-45f7-b9ac-495775537d0f Wed, 12 Jun 2024 05:36:00 -0400 Natural antioxidants could delay age-related decline in male testosterone production
研究发现，缺铁的不同定义导致对患病率的估计不同定义缺铁 (ID) 的不同方法如何影响女性中这种常见疾病的患病率估计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Differing-definitions-of-iron-deficiency-lead-to-divergent-estimates-of-prevalence-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Differing-definitions-of-iron-deficiency-lead-to-divergent-estimates-of-prevalence-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5597f2f9-8c68-44ea-9b22-1592b5244bae Wed, 12 Jun 2024 04:59:00 -0400 Differing definitions of iron deficiency lead to divergent estimates of prevalence, study finds
AI 使用 EfficientNet 彻底改变了疟疾诊断，准确率高达 97.57%人工智能工具，利用深度学习检查血涂片中的红细胞图像，以便及时检测疟疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/AI-revolutionizes-malaria-diagnosis-with-975725-accuracy-using-EfficientNet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/AI-revolutionizes-malaria-diagnosis-with-975725-accuracy-using-EfficientNet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=981c67ce-338c-475d-aa09-e0c5432a8e54 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 04:30:00 -0400 AI revolutionizes malaria diagnosis with 97.57% accuracy using EfficientNet
腰围身高比在预测心血管疾病风险方面超越传统指标研究表明，腰围身高比 (WHtR) 在预测缺血性心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险方面优于体脂百分比 (BF%) 和其他中心性肥胖指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Waist-to-height-ratio-surpasses-conventional-metrics-in-predicting-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Waist-to-height-ratio-surpasses-conventional-metrics-in-predicting-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd6dff3a-57d8-46bc-8b31-cadf0ad8a5cc Wed, 12 Jun 2024 00:46:00 -0400 Waist-to-height ratio surpasses conventional metrics in predicting cardiovascular disease risk
研究表明，肠道细菌将膳食植酸转化为促进健康的脂肪酸研究表明，人类肠道细菌，特别是 Mitsuokella jalaludinii，可以有效地将膳食植酸降解为短链脂肪酸，通过微生物协同作用增强健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Gut-bacteria-turn-dietary-phytate-into-health-boosting-fatty-acids-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Gut-bacteria-turn-dietary-phytate-into-health-boosting-fatty-acids-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=292bf5c4-6cfd-4135-a792-263bb41ece6c Wed, 12 Jun 2024 00:28:00 -0400 Gut bacteria turn dietary phytate into health-boosting fatty acids, study shows
